divs: Sighting DetailsTonight at roughly 10.15pm (GMT) August 8,I saw what looked like a large star (a star size x 50,floating over my house NO SOUND +-100miles north of London going from West to East,it was I would say about the size of a 50 pence coin,if one held it at arms length. 10 to one it will be on the local news (ITV) in the morning. What a rush...........
trends: There have been no other sightings in Feltwell
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Floating silent large star looking object
